item.description:
Hi Everyone!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


We had such a great time at John's for our last Pot Luck meetup, we decided to do it again!!! The discussion we had at our last group meeting was so engaging we wanted to continue the educational process without a strict time limit.

We are fortunate to have a location a bit more centralized for those who would find it difficult to make it John's. Please email directly @ rideantiquehds@sbcglobal.net for directions.

FYI, here are a few of John's past TV appearances:

Larry King Live,
CrossFire
Morton Downey Jr Show
Nightline
World News Tonite

Please consider joining us for a profitable, rejuvenating time!!!
item.name: Laurel Canyon (and More) @ The American Dreamers' House in SUFFIELD
